subject: X Games
Snowboarding
Freestyle Skiing
lead_paragraph: This week’s X Games will feature three events — ski halfpipe, and snowboard and ski slopestyle — that appear set to become Olympic additions at the 2014 Winter Games.
snippet: This week’s X Games will feature three events — ski halfpipe, and snowboard and ski slopestyle — that appear set to become Olympic additions at the 2014 Winter Games.
